title: Understanding the Goal
text: The primary goal for clients with schizophrenia is to maintain stability. This involves several key aspects related to their health and well-being.

title: Medication Adherence
text: One of the crucial components in maintaining stability for clients with schizophrenia is adherence to their prescribed medications.

title: Healthcare Interaction
text: Continued interaction with healthcare providers is essential for monitoring and adjusting treatment plans as needed.

title: Managing Side Effects
text: Mitigating adverse reactions and side effects of medications is important to ensure the client's comfort and willingness to continue treatment.

title: Nutritional Status
text: Maintaining optimal nutritional status can support overall health and well-being, which is crucial for clients with schizophrenia.

title: Social and Occupational Functioning
text: Encouraging social and occupational functioning helps clients integrate into society and improve their quality of life.
